summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A TEGOL OUTLAW MOTORCYCLE HELMET, MODEL: V5-05, SIZE: EXTRA SMALL. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17E015000 (EQUIPMENT). THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 866-371-0281 APPROXIMATELY ONE MONTH AGO. THE CONTACT LEFT THE REQUIRED VOICEMAIL FOR A CALL BACK, BUT THERE HAD BEEN NO RESPONSE. THE CONTACT DID NOT SEND AN E-MAIL TO TEGOLINC@GMAIL.COM. THE CONTACT FELT THAT A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME HAD PASSED FOR THE RECALL REMEDY. THE CONTACT DID NOT EXPERIENCE A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
